description:
To turn Bilac into an ancestral craftswoman and to get the futuristic toys in Inventoria up and running, Sunraku needs a magic control unit.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Half-Naked Birdman and the Gang in Golem Paradise
Hanra to Yukai na Nakama-tachi in Golem Paradise
Semi-nudisme et amis in golem paradise
半裸と愉快な仲間達inゴーレムパラダイス
